summary: The diff shows only metadata files (frontend-file-summaries.txt and project_state.json) were updated to describe planned features. No actual implementation of the 16 requirements (REQ-228 through REQ-243) for responsive video/photo editors is present in the diff. All required files, components, hooks, stores, and route changes are missing.
